mapper.select: select mc.name mcName,r.phone,r.money,r.createTime,r.qrcodeUrl,md.shopName,md.shopAddress,md.logo shopLogo from handle_record r left join merchant_card mc on r.mcId=mc.id left join merchant md on mc.shopId=md.id where r.uuid=#{uuid}
